None.Name: Soul Sacrifice
None.Description: Targeted own unit loses 250 life points and in turn heals friendly units within a 15m radius around it for up to 860 life points in total every second. Lasts for 10 seconds or until target dies. The target unit cannot be healed while under the influence of this spell. Reusable every 5 seconds.
